A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Wizard of Oz in space with a little Mary Poppins thrown in for no discernable reason - Finn wants courage\, Poe wants a tactical brain & Rey realises she's not in Kansas anymore! Enjoyed it at the cinema\, but the plot holes\, misteps\, mistakes and elements that messed with the original constraints of the universe have tarnished the Star Wars legacy more than any prequel ever did.
